title: Quick Sketch of Waves on Rocks
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
medium: Pen and black ink on off-white wove paper
description: Large wave crashing against two rocks in foreground and cliff at left. Second set of cliffs in distance at left. 1
name: Sketchbook folio
